name: ENPA Ingestion Pipeline
description: A batch processing pipeline that can be used to ingest private data shares according to the Exposure Notification Private Analytics protocol

parameters.name: firebaseProjectId
parameters.label: Firebase project ID
parameters.helpText: Firebase Project Id to read from.

parameters.name: PHAOutput
parameters.label: PHA output
parameters.helpText: File prefix for output files for PHA

parameters.name: facilitatorOutput
parameters.label: Facilitator output
parameters.helpText: File prefix for output files for Facilitator.

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.label: Start time
parameters.helpText: Start time in seconds of documents to process.

parameters.name: gracePeriodBackwards
parameters.label: Grace period backwards
parameters.helpText: Seconds to read backwards from startTime.

parameters.name: gracePeriodForwards
parameters.label: Grace period forwards
parameters.helpText: Seconds to read forward from startTime.

parameters.name: minimumParticipantCount
parameters.label: Minimum participant count
parameters.helpText: Minimum count of participants to preserve privacy.

parameters.name: Delete
parameters.label: Delete
parameters.helpText: Delete documents at end of pipeline.

parameters.name: partitionCount
parameters.label: Partition count
parameters.helpText: Maximum number of partitions to create for Firestore query.

parameters.name: keyResourceName
parameters.label: Key resource name
parameters.helpText: KMS resource name for signature generation.
